sourcesContent:
import "./post.css" import MoreVertIcon from '@mui/icons-material/MoreVert'; import { Users } from "../../dummyData" // posts may contain: // (i) patients past complaints // (ii) topics that patient may be interested in or doctors he/she is following // (iii) updates/new messages from groups that they're in export default function Post({post}) { return (
u.id === post?.userId)[0].profilePicture} alt="" className="postProfileImg" /> {Users.filter((u) => u.id === post?.userId)[0].username} {post.date}
{/* question mark in next line is for posts that don't have a desc */} {post?.desc}
{post.like} people like it
{post.comment} comments
) }
